definition: twenty (20), in a limited number of set expressions/also written using banker's character 念
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
Golden Week, two 7-day national holiday periods
Mt Huang/Yellow mountains/Huangshan prefecture-level city centered around Huangshan Mountains in south Anhui
Huang Guangyu (1969-), PRC entrepreneur and millionaire, founder of GOME Electrical 國美電器|国美电器[Guo2 mei3 Dian4 qi4]
ox/cattle/scalper of tickets etc/to fail to show up/to break a promise

Yellow Crane Tower in Wuhan City, built in 223, burnt down in 1884, rebuilt in 1985/favored place of poet sages, who in legend arrived riding golden cranes/Tang poem by Cui Hao 崔顥|崔颢[Cui1 Hao4], with theme 'the past will never return'/one of three famous pagodas in China along with Yueyang Tower 岳陽樓|岳阳楼[Yue4 yang2 Lou2] in Yueyang, north Hunan, and Tengwang Tower 滕王閣|滕王阁[Teng2 wang2 Ge2] in Nanchang, Jiangxi

sentences.english: All his life, Dr Huang served the people.
sentences.chinese: 黃醫生爲人民服務了一輩子。

sentences.english: Researchers could also work to increase the xanthohumol content of hops.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員也能增加蛇麻草中的黃腐酚含量。

sentences.english: Kevin Huang and David Lin are classmates.
sentences.chinese: 黃課文和林大衛是同班同學。

sentences.english: Filtrates produced from antagonistic bacteria were also inhibitory to growth of V. dahliae.
sentences.chinese: 這些拮抗菌的培養濾液也能抑制棉花黃萎菌的生長。

sentences.english: A naughty monkey is yellow, yellow teeth.
sentences.chinese: 小猴更調皮，叫小黃“黃牙小子”。

sentences.english: I would like to discuss the price of Indonesian Beige materials of your company.
sentences.chinese: 想跟您商量一下貴公司印尼米黃荒料的價格。

sentences.english: The application of K section method in Huanglashi landslide is mainly introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了K剖面法在黃臘石滑坡中的應用情況。

sentences.english: Yellow to porch suffer Hong Kong police, who had to go to taking home for help.
sentences.chinese: 黃以軒遭受香港警方通緝，只好前去去晏家求助。

sentences.english: I particularly love their Rice Noodle Soup, and the Panang Curry chicken over rice.
sentences.chinese: 我特別喜歡他們的牛肉湯河粉和黃咖哩雞燴飯。

sentences.english: Kaylin Huang graduated from Franklin High School in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 黃愷琳今年畢業於糜鹿林的富蘭克林高中。

sentences.english: The colors in white light are red, orange, yellow, green, blue and violet .
sentences.chinese: 在白光中的顏色有紅，橙，黃，綠，藍和青。

sentences.english: Yellow bell peppers add color and flavor to any recipe.
sentences.chinese: 黃柿子椒添加顏色和味道的任何配方。

sentences.english: Sometimes you also get a yellow circle around the iris.
sentences.chinese: 有時，你的虹膜周圍還會有黃圈。

sentences.english: Yellow Tea is a non-fermented or non-oxidized tea.
sentences.chinese: 黃茶的品質特點是“黃葉黃湯”。

definition: surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
(used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
